text: Yehosafat yɛɛ ɔdefo a na nʼanuonyam nso korɔn. Ɔhyehyɛ maa ne babarima waree Israelhene Ahab babea.18.1 Ɛha na wɔka Yehosafat nhyira ne ahonya a onya fii ne nokwaredi mu ho asɛm. Wɔka ananafo nkabomdi a ɔnam aware a ɔne Ɔhene Ahab yɛe a na odiyifo no mpɛ ho asɛm (19.2-3). Saa Ahab babea Atalia aware yi, anka ɛrema wɔatɔre Dawid anato no ase. (22.10–23.21).
